clusterList.phrase: i might sound like a politician but i'm looking forward to spending more time with my family
i am not leaving for political reasons or for health reasons but rather because i have learned that life is short and there is a great deal that i have yet to experience and enjoy
i'm leaving to spend more time with my family
i have time for my family which is good i have time for me and my wife
that's just as well i'm not going to give up until you leave my family for good they have done nothing wrong
if you're going to leave then get on with it
it's been too long and has taken a toll on my family
